summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 29, 2020, discussing a request for agent assistance from Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The emails coordinate volunteer availability and note the large volume of evidence being processed.

persons.name: SA M
persons.context: An FBI Special Agent who is asked to assist with the Epstein/Maxwell investigation and indicates willingness if approved by their supervisor.

events.title: FBI Request for Assistance on Epstein/Maxwell Case
events.description: Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) sends an internal request for FBI agent assistance for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, describing it as a unique, high-profile opportunity.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) was actively seeking agent assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 29, 2020.
The investigation involved a 'large volume of evidence' that required significant time to process.
The request for assistance was described as a 'unique opportunity' to work on a 'high profile case'.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination, with agents needing supervisory approval to volunteer.
